sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from "react"; import './booking.css' import { Form, FormGroup, ListGroup, ListGroupItem, Button } from 'reactstrap' import {useNavigate} from "react-router-dom" const Booking = ({ tour, avgRating }) => { const { price, reviews } = tour const navigate= useNavigate() const [credentials, setCredentials] = useState({ userId: "01", userEmail: "bodhi.krishna121@gmail.com", fullName: " ", phone: " ", guestSize: 1, bookAt: " " }) const handleChange = e => { setCredentials(prev => ({ ...prev, [e.target.id]: e.target.value })) }; const serviceFee = 10; const totalAmount = Number(price) * Number(credentials.guestSize) + Number(serviceFee) //send data to the server const handleClick = e => { e.preventDefault() navigate("/thankyou"); } return

${price} /per person

{avgRating === 0 ? null : avgRating} ({reviews?.length})
{/* booking form */}
Information
{/* booking form ends */} {/* booking bottom */}
${price} 1 person
${price}
Service charges
${serviceFee}
Total
${totalAmount}
}; export default Booking;
